```{r Create a Baseline Model without respondent_ID}

# Exclude respondent_id and other target variables from predictors as it has a moderate positive correlation
# Model for h1n1_vaccine
model_h1n1 <- glm(h1n1_vaccine ~ . - respondent_id - seasonal_vaccine,
                  data = data_train,
                  family = binomial)

# Model for seasonal_vaccine
model_seasonal <- glm(seasonal_vaccine ~ . - respondent_id - h1n1_vaccine,
                      data = data_train,
                      family = binomial)

# summary(model_h1n1)

```
